The software is designed to help tracing reading/playing/watching challenges.
The software has two frontend written in Vue.js located in the `frontend` directory.
The software has a backend written in Rust located in the `backend` directory.
The software has some scripts written in Python located in the `scripts` directory.

Software is deployed to a generic ubuntu vm

Database for storage is SQLite and its scruture is in backend/migrations

For authentication and user management, the software auth0.
